recipe.title: Hold-The-Lime Guacamole
ingredients: 2 serrano chiles, stemmed, seeded, finely chopped
instructions: Combine chiles, cilantro, and onion in a large bowl. Just before serving, halve and seed avocados, scoop out pulp, and mash pulp into chile mixture with a fork until just combined. Season with salt and serve immediately.
